Hey Solly, how was your race weekend?

Thanks for asking! It was a challenging weekend. I'm still not comfortable on the bike as we are having issues with set-up. I don't have a great feel for the front end, and it feels like the bike is going to crash every corner. I struggled with set-up on Friday and Saturday AM, and didn't qualify well. I was disappointed in myself, but decided to put my head down and ride and I finished 11th in race 1. On Sunday in Race 2, in the pouring rain, I started 14th, and made it to 5th before the race was red flagged for a rider who crashed. After the race was red flagged I crashed, and they penalized me, so I ended up tied for 11th overall in points, 2 points out of 8th. We have a break now, so I can really get to work on the bike, and figure it out. Thanks again for asking! SM

Bo Bendsneyder's replacement reasons

Bo Bendsneyder is actually replacing Bahattin Sofuoglu at MV Agusta Reparto Corse, not the other way around. Sofuoglu decided to leave the team mid-season, and Bendsneyder was brought in as his replacement for the remaining rounds of the 2024 season Â¹ Â².

As for why Sofuoglu left, it seems that the 2024 season was a challenging one for MV Agusta, and Sofuoglu decided to part ways with the team earlier than expected Â¹ Â².

On the other hand, Bendsneyder's own team, Preicanos Moto2, parted ways with him due to lacking results and a "leak of confidential information" that created tension within the team Â³.
Clayron
